API_SECRET.description: This must match the API_SECRET password from your Nightscout website

WEBSITE_HOSTNAME.description: The host name for your Nightscout instance, for example yoursite.herokuapp.com or yoursite.azurewebsites.net. Do not include http:// or https://.

CARELINK_REQUEST_INTERVAL.description: OPTIONAL: number of milliseconds to wait between requests to the CareLink server (default: 60000)

CARELINK_SGV_LIMIT.description: OPTIONAL: maximum number of recent sensor glucose values to send to Nightscout (default: 24)

CARELINK_MAX_RETRY_DURATION.description: OPTIONAL: maximum number of seconds to spend retrying failed requests to CareLink, ideally a power of 2 (default: 512)

CARELINK_QUIET.description: OPTIONAL: set to a truthy value to not output details of CareLink and Nightscout requests to the console (default: empty)

NS.description: OPTIONAL: a fully-qualified Nightscout URL (e.g. https://sitename.azurewebsites.net) which overrides WEBSITE_HOSTNAME
